Jogo é legal, o lobby é uma merda e a comunidade é toxica, mas o jogo é legal.

全体の調整にが難しいのはわかるけれど少しバグが多すぎる。以前なくしたバグも再度アップデートすると出現したりするので、少々面倒。特に救助バグ・治療バグは致命的。個人にバグが起きるのは自分が萎えるだけで済むけど他人にも及ぶバグは正直に言うと迷惑。なぜ救助しないのか、なぜ治療しないのかは相手側にはわからないから只々NOOBになる。タイミングが重要な要素の一つとなってるゲームで行動に変な制限がかかる事とかは最悪の一言に尽きる。キラーもサバイバーも両方する身としては少しキラー有利じゃないと勝負にならない。最近色々な機種でもＤＢＤができるようになって少し有名になったからこそ、もう少し調整に時間を割いてもよかったんじゃないかなと思った。ただ、昔からやっている身としては今後に期待して少しずつでも触れたらいいなと思っている。頑張ってほしい。


I find it difficult to adjust the whole thing, but there are too many bugs. Bugs that have been lost before will appear again when updated again, which is a bit cumbersome. Rescue bugs and treatment bugs are particularly fatal. Bugs that occur in individuals can only be withered, but bugs that extend to others are annoying to be honest. Because the other side doesn't know why they are not rescued or why they are not treated, they often become NOOB. In a game where timing is one of the important elements, it is the worst word to say that the behavior is restricted strangely. If you are both a killer and a survivor, you won't be able to compete unless you are a little killer. I thought that it would have been better to spend a little more time adjusting because the DBD was able to be made popular on various models recently. However, as a person who has been doing it for a long time, I hope to touch it little by little in the future. I want you to do your best.

Very fun co-op game to play with friends or strangers really. 
There are some bugs but aside from having problems regarding left click functions and sometimes audio - It's fine.
The community is pretty alright- unless you are really unlucky- usually the people you play with are fine and share the same goals as you and won't actively sabotage or get you killed.
I'm speaking as a survivor main- I can't really give much of an opinion regarding how the game is as a killer.
I do feel that the Wraith/Freddy could be reworked- as they seem very broken/exploitable but that's just my two cents.
The only scary thing about this game is how horridly bad your team of survivors will be if you are alone or with 1 other person.

Where do I begin. I dedicate so much of my life as a gamer to this game. Between 2 platforms I have around 2000 hours. The game is fun and I find myself quite addicted to it and the formula. It's challenging and I think that's part of what I love so much about it.

Pros: 
-The concept is great. There's almost a rhythm to the game once you become halfway decent at it. 
-It's fun with friends or a party chat. 
-There's a grind, and the game is updated frequently.

Cons: 
-Being a asymmetrical horror game, it is hard for the devs to balance. I do feel like the game is better of now that it was a year ago, and that's a good thing. You have to be willing to tolerate bugs, poor servers, hackers, and more. 

I do think the devs do all that they can do to make the game better and I don't hold a lot of the issues against them. 

6.5/10 - It's fun, but not for everyone.

Dead by daylight é um jogo bem diferente do convencional.
Objetivo do game é basicamente isso:
São 5 jogadores em uma partida, 4 sobreviventes e 1 assassino;
O objetivo dos sobreviventes é ligar 5 geradores espalhados aleatoriamente pelo mapa, ligando esses geradores você consegue liga a energia para que o portão de saída seja aberto possibilitando  a vitória* do game se você conseguir escapar.
*Viu que usei aspas em vitória? Exatamente, conseguir escapar no jogo não é bem uma vitória, sendo que pra você conseguir subir de rank, você não precisa necessariamente fugir. Basta consegue pontos de sangue suficiente para ganhar pontos de rank.
Agora vamos para o objetivo do assassino:
Você tem que matar todo mundo. (É isso, kkk piadas.)
Bom se for pra seguir a lore do game é bem simples de explicar. 
Existe uma especie de deusa no game chamada " a entidade ", ela se alimenta de esperança, esperança essa que se acumula cada vez que um sobrevivente consegue pontos de sangue, para ela poder consumir essa esperança o sobrevivente tem que ser sacrificado, ta ai a função do assassino, ele tem que perseguir os sobreviventes até conseguir o sacrifício dos 4. Maaaaaas como falei antes, você não precisa necessariamente conseguir os 4 sacrifícios ja que o que conta no game rank são os pontos de sangue.

Após jogar algumas horas eu consegui me divertir bastante e ainda não cansei nenhum pouco do game, ja que toda partida tem algo diferente, vão existir coisas que vão fazer você rir, coisas que vão te irritar e ate mesmo reclamar do balanceamento do jogo, mas isso é fachada, você supera. 
Recomendo muito jogar com amigos, deixa qualquer jogo ainda mais divertido. Bom se quiserem se aprofundar mais no game recomento um guia completo, eu li e me ajudou muito. 
Divirtam-se! 

Guia: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1440859390

This isn't, fundamentally, a bad game. It's certainly possible to have fun playing it, and getting stuck into the nuances of the mechanics and the strategies involved feels fun and rewarding. You can attain a degree of mastery over it, and achieving that mastery feels great. 

That's exactly what makes it so frustrating though. If this was a bad game, you'd just move on, "Eh, another bad game, who cares." This is a good game unfortunately let down by huge, obvious flaws that the community all knows about, but the devs are unable or unwilling to solve. That one round where everything clicks into place, and the game finally feels fair and exciting, is fantastic. But you'll have seven rounds around it that are completely inconsistent, frustrating, toxic, etc. There's a great game there under a mountain of design problems. But those problems will never get fixed until DBD's players are fed up, and by then, it'll be too late.

I have no hope that Behaviour will save this game, but I do hope that someone makes a really good DBD clone one day. (VCR plays more like Evolve.)

EDIT: Tried to get back into this again recently. Would like to amend this review: this is a fundamentally bad game.

Игра хорошая, стоит своих денег. 
Рассмотрю все плюсы и минусы этой игры:
+Плюсы:
1.Хорошая задумка концепции игры.
2.Довольно неплохая графика для 2016 с соответствующей оптимизацией.
3.Многообразие персонажей, навыков, сил убийц.
4.Большая вариативность геймплея.
5.Ассиметричный геймплей для игроков.
-Минусы:
1.Довольно токсичное комьюнити, которого особенно много играют на низких-средних рангах.
2.Плохой баланс по рангам, т.е вы за маньяка 13 ранга можете попасть против 3 выживших красного ранга и одной 20-ки.
3.Многочисленное количество различных багов, которые могут как помочь тебе или же жестоко тебя подставить.
4.Зависимость хода всей игры от маньяка, который является хостом. В любой момент маньяк может подключить свои ссаные торренты и вас будет телепортировать по всей карте.

Idea muy original. Muy pocos juegos hoy en día, tienen ideas originales como este. Todos los personajes son bastante parejos entre sí (con algunas excepciones). Muy divertido para jugar con amigos. Las partidas son muy cortas, duran entre 10 y 30 minutos cada una. Claramente lo recomiendo. Aclaro que no me gustan los juegos de terror, pero este me fascina.

NEGATIVO: los servers. No tienen servers dedicados, entonces hace tarde en inicar una partida. Muchas veces algun player se desconecta, o antes de iniciar te kickea el server y perdés los accesorios. Espero (y supongo) que lo arreglarán en un futuro no muy lejano. Otro punto negativo son la cantidad enorme de DLC disponibles, si bien cada uno no es caro (2 dólares), me da bronca la verdad.

Oh where to start with DbD.... I used to love this game and I constantly keep wondering where did we all go so wrong with this? And I believe I have some ideas what happened:

First and foremost the devs and (more so) the community keeps thinking this game would be best as a competitive game which, let me remind you, it was never build to be. This is not some highly polished game that wants to create an even battlefield with fair chances for everyone. After all that is the point of an assymetrical game in the first place. It is not meant to be fair. 

And competitiveness is the big deal that they are trying to achieve with this game these days. I find that to be rather sad given how much I enjoyed the original idea of the game of "you are part of a horror film. good luck." So while this new approach to the game is rather disheartening for me I am sure that there are plenty of people out there who love the game even more than ever. 

Lastly, the monetization. We have seasonal killer & survivor add-on packs for around 10 bucks, weekly cosmetics that used to be able to be unlocked by playing but are mainly available for auric cells (the games hardcash conversion currency) at 10 bucks each as well. Then there is the battle pass plus stages for around 100 bucks and that is seasonal as well. So basically the devs want you to drop 300 bucks into the game every 3 months and I am sorry but that is ridiculous even for todays standards. 

To anyone who supports this kind of behaviour, thank you. You are part of the problem. To anyone new with the game, spend your money on something else. Think of all the awesome food you can buy with all the cash you saved. You're welcome.

不知道有多少人会看到我的评论！！
2017年3月左右碰巧在某个直播那里看到了黎明杀机这款游戏，当时我看到了就特别感兴趣。回家后就自己百度查游戏名，查是什么游戏在那里可以玩到，当时的心里就是我马上必须立刻得玩到这款游戏不能等！也是因为黎明杀机这款游戏让我知道了STEAM这个平台，原先STEAM是个什么玩意，我压根不知道。。。。购买了之后，我立刻忘我的玩了起来，太有意思了真好玩！刚买游戏那会是真的喜欢觉得好玩，当时跟很多人一样，玩个人类到处蹲蘑菇生怕被屠夫发现听到屠夫的心跳就紧张！（经常通宵玩）黎明杀机真的是我的菜好玩喜欢！游戏里出的DLC也是基本上都买了，毕竟都是玩国内的免费网游过来的人。像黎明杀机这样的游戏有多良心相信大家也都很清楚，那必须要花钱支持他们的游戏和公司太良心了！原本想得就这么美好的一直玩下去。直到2019年3月2号左右我的号被莫名其妙VAC封禁，我才知道原来在别处看到的有些人说自己从来没有用过任何作弊工具，却被莫名其妙的封禁是完全有可能发生在自己身上的。是的没错，那一天我莫名奇怪的被封禁了。我明明没有使用过任何作弊工具却被封禁了！！！我立刻找到了怎样给黎明杀机官方回邮件的方法（给不知道的人在说一下百度的黎明杀机贴吧里面有如何给官方发邮件申诉的方法和教程不知道的玩家赶紧去学习）官方回复我的也只有我违反了他们发出来的某项条例中的一项，到底是哪条我也不知道（全是英文我是学渣呢那么多条啥都看不懂呵呵）只知道是那么多条中的其中一条，我恳请官方调查我被封禁的时间，可以一直从3月2号左右往前面的时间一直调查，看我是否使用过作弊工具。可是官方不会再回复我的邮件了就是不理我了（我已被永久封禁了呵呵哒）以上这些都是本人的经历了。
在这里告诉所有已经购买或者准备购买黎明杀机的玩家说一下。一万个人中就是可能会有一个人没有使用作弊工具但是就是会被封禁了！也许那个莫名其妙被封禁就是你！真的别觉得封禁和误封一定都是别人，自己绝对不可能会被误封！我真实的告诉你，也许你就是那一万个人中的那个人！（我就是个例子呵呵哒）
黎明杀机真的是一款很不错的游戏，从画面环境气氛都很不错哦！如果你喜欢猫鼠游戏，那么这绝对是一款不会让你失望的游戏哦！（我一个1658小时DLC如此良心基本全买的玩家强烈推荐！）
最后也跟官方的人说下，没有用作弊就是没有用作弊你们就是误封了我的号！想调查尽管去调查我的号！（当然你们连邮件都不回复了还谈什么调查呢呵呵）我是真的想发自内心的问候你们的家人，但是我不能再这里说脏话哈哈！（一些只会说你被封禁了，那你一定是使用了作弊工具的孤儿。用没用我心里清楚哈不用你们这些孤儿来提醒我谢谢）
好啦差不多想说的都说完啦。祝大家游戏愉快天天开心！！感谢那些在我还是新手的时候没有杀我放我走的好心屠夫，也跟那些我当屠夫放走的人类玩家最后还会跟我说声谢谢的人说，不用客气加油成为人皇吧！而我只能跟这个游戏说再见了！（其实我有点怀疑会不会是封禁了我这个号，想让我在去重新开个号来买黎明杀机呢呵呵哒）就这么多啦再见各位！

Although I really enjoy the concept of the game and the characters in its’ entirety, the constant technical issues ruined my experience. I started playing back when there were only 3 killers (Wraith, Trapper and Hillbilly) so I basically saw the game grow in its’ stages. There used to be issues with matchmaking where the game would be stuck searching for a game, either playing solo or with friends. There were a lot of glitches when hitting the ready button and then it queues up to the loading screen only to be sent back to the lobby. Thus, earning it’s name as “Lobby Simulator.” It took so long for these glitches to be addressed and even now they appear here and there.

被弱智队友和守尸鬼气到吐血。sb匹配机制真的脑残，队友开局就把白房板直接放倒，队友各种白给，鬼一直追我，队友一台机都不开，被挂了然后鬼还一直守着，队友不敢来救但是半天也没开机，到最后队友来救一下来也直接倒也没有办法。玩鬼还遇到各种车队整的血压升高，总之一定要开黑玩，跟路人玩游戏环境直接崩盘,平衡辣鸡不说还有各种bug负优化，更新之后游戏甚至直接卡死，每次贼小的一个更新就要把整个游戏文件验证一遍验你吗呢？

This isn't just about me a lot of people go through this but as much I love this game the only problem i have in this game is killers enjoying to camp a survivor for 5 mins or so. WHAT'S to enjoy in that.. 
That's not my cup-of-tea. Camping-killers know that it takes patience and skill to be a good killer but I tried to deal with it as the best i can but now i start to lose it. 
If they can do anything about the killer-camping i might consider playing again. I hate to stop playing my favorite horror game but there's other enjoyable horror games.

I have mainly played this game on the Xbox (Bad PC)

It's a really fun game to play on your own or with friends, the aim of the game changes, depending on what you play as; Killer or Survivor.

Survivors: At the start of the game there's 7 generators that are randomly spawned into the map but there's fixed locations they spawn, 4 survivors have to work together to achieve their common goal; Escape! The survivors have to fix 5 of them to power the exit gate, which they can open and escape through. Throughout the game the survivors have to hide and flee from the killer. Teamwork plays a huge role in the outcome of the game. 

Killers: Get fucking stunned, lol.
тип норм

El juego ha cambiado mucho claramente desde sus inicios, y yo lo juego a ratos, no todo el día como los muchos enfermos y tóxicos que hay. Antes el juego se sentía siniestro, tenía su estilo oscuro y a veces te podías dar sustos por el Asesino, ahora es más un juego de persecuciones al estilo ladrones [spoiler](supervivientes con sus putos generadores)[/spoiler] y policias [spoiler](asesinos con sus "carceles")[/spoiler]... no se que le dieron a los desarrolladores ahora que están haciendo todos los mapas super iluminados o con 0 de niebla por lo que se ve todo el mapa a kilómetros; ya no existe el suspense debido a la falta de niebla, que aún usando ofrendas de oscurecerla, sigue siendo casi nula.

De un día para otro el juego no cambia de forma brusca, claramente ha tenido (por lo que creo yo) culpa la comunidad, todos sabemos como puede ser la gente de llorona así que he de suponer que esta es la parte de todo el problema ya que todo empezó desde el crossplay principalmente.

El juego es divertido, tiene sus puntos a favor y sus puntos en contra, están mejorando el juego visualmente en cuanto a gráficos por lo que veo pero el detalle de la iluminación la veo nefasta, con la actualización de hoy la granja siniestra ha pasado a una granja... del rd2 abandonada? Como dije, no se en que están pensando los desarrolladores, deberían balancear el juego más en vez de estar todo el rato desbalanceandolo, o añadir ciertos limites a los supervivientes en usos de perks porque ya es un cachondeo la de upgrades que están recibiendo mientras los asesinos reciben todo el rato downgrades.

Juego ambas facciones, supervivientes y asesinos, y mi perspectiva para jugadores nuevos es que jueguen con amigos únicamente, no al estilo premade de supervivientes inútiles contra un asesino desconocido, si no partidas personalizadas en las que el asesino y supervivientes sean todos amigos. 

Los matchmaking de este juego son horribles, mucha gente es "smurf" (se bajan el nivel aposta para enfrentarse a asesinos nuevos o con poca experiencia para joderles la vida básicamente) y en rangos bajos, especialmente entre el rango 1-8 son más tóxicos a más no poder, ya me han tocado muchas partidas como Killer en las que los 4 supervivientes van todos con las mismas 4 perks y claramente, hablando por micro porque se nota de lejos que van super coordinados, sin quitar el "teabag" y los "tics de linterna". Esto con grupos que van los 4 separados no pasa, se disfruta más o jugando personalizadas siendo los 5 amigos, o jugando con todos completamente desconocidos y viceversa. Los pre-mades (especialmente tóxicos) y constantes desbalances arruinan el juego.

Buenos juegos, estropeados a lo bestia por la comunidad [spoiler]("que novedoso")[/spoiler]

Si la gente fuera menos tóxica, o no usarán TODOS las MISMAS 4-6 HABILIDADES recomendaría más este juego.
They took Davids Six Pack away. How could they. #nohomo

O jogo é bom, proporciona fortes emoções como todo jogo de terror/survival deve proporcionar. Embora seja jogado em mapas de tamanhos medianos, consegue proporcionar vários detalhes com as habilidades dos personagens e outras características do jogo. Possui bugs que incomodam sim e que não conseguiram corrigir desde que comecei a jogar. Também ainda não tem servidor dedicado, porém isso será corrigido em breve.
Mas é um jogo que vale a pena jogar, bem divertido. Recomendo.
